skills.title: About Me
skills.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer specialized in Frontend and a Game Development, focused on building solid, intuitive, and visually engaging digital experiences. I primarily work with TypeScript, React, and Angular for web development, and with PixiJS, Unity, and Unreal Engine/UEFN for game development, blending technical efficiency with creativity. Beyond coding, I'm known for being responsible, proactive, and highly adaptable to new environments and technologies. I enjoy working in teams, communicating ideas clearly, and collaborating on projects where both product quality and development process matter. My goal is to deliver functional, scalable, and well-structured solutions, always with a positive attitude and a strong drive for continuous growth.
